fields.name: exchange
fields.title: Exchange Reaction Identifier
fields.description: The exchange reaction identifiers must correspond to the metabolic model identifiers.

fields.name: lower
fields.title: Lower Bound
fields.description: The lower bound for the exchange reaction. For models following common practices this is the uptake rate.

fields.name: upper
fields.title: Upper Bound
fields.description: The upper bound for the exchange reaction. For models following common practices this is the secretion rate.

fields.name: comment
fields.title: Comment
fields.description: Optional comment which is not processed further.
